description.firstline: If you want to be one of the first people to check Polkadex Orderbook and THEA out and start trading, stay tuned in the {{ambassador}} and {{validator}} channels on Discord.

footer.title: Test trading?
footer.description: Polkadex Orderbook is now running on the Polkadex mainnet in private beta mode.

cards.secondCard: DOT and USDT from the Relay Chain and AssetHub can now be deposited to Polkadex via the Polkadex parachain and traded on Polkadex Orderbook.
cards.thirdCard: Polkadex validators and ambassadors can now start making trades with real assets.
cards.fourthCard: Market making has not yet gone live.
cards.fifthCard: Trade orders are currently only placed and filled by Polkadex ambassadors and validators (aka individual traders).
